Directions: Place broccoli and a small amount of water in a saucepan; bring to a boil. Reduce heat; cover and cook for 5-8 minutes or until crisp-tender. Meanwhile, in a small saucepan, combine the sugar, cornstarch and bouillon. Stir in water, orange juice and peel until blended.  Bring to a boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes until thickened.
Drain broccoli and place in a serving bowl. Garnish with orange slices and drizzle with sauce.
Ingredients: 1 pound fresh or frozen broccoli spears
